testcase.name: test_voices_have_gender_field

failure.message: AssertionError: Voice nova missing 'gender' field assert 'gender' in {'accent': 'English', 'description': 'Clear, professional international voice', 'id': 'nova', 'language': 'en', ...}

testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_voice_mapping_v31.py:142: in test_voices_have_gender_field assert "gender" in voice, f"Voice {voice.get('id')} missing 'gender' field" E AssertionError: Voice nova missing 'gender' field E assert 'gender' in {'accent': 'English', 'description': 'Clear, professional international voice', 'id': 'nova', 'language': 'en', ...}

testcase.name: test_voices_have_nigerian_names

failure.message: AssertionError: Expected voice name 'Emeka' not found assert 'Emeka' in ['Nova', 'Onyx', 'Olúwásẹ̀un', 'Abubakar', 'Chinyere']

testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_voice_mapping_v31.py:154: in test_voices_have_nigerian_names assert name in found_names, f"Expected voice name '{name}' not found" E AssertionError: Expected voice name 'Emeka' not found E assert 'Emeka' in ['Nova', 'Onyx', 'Olúwásẹ̀un', 'Abubakar', 'Chinyere']

testcase.name: test_onyx_voice_is_male
